snippet: 10:16 p.m. | Updated  Another rainy day with bad traffic jams and little track action marked the beginning of what is, in the end, a very typical race weekend at Silverstone, England.
abstract: 10:16 p.m. | Updated Another rainy day with bad traffic jams and little track action marked the beginning of what is, in the end, a very typical race weekend at Silverstone, England.

headline.main: A Soggy Return to 'The Home of Motor Sport.' Why?
